title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT: MANOS THE HANDS OF FATE & BLOODY PIT OF HORROR

sources.title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT: MANOS THE HANDS OF FATE & BLOODY PIT OF HORROR
sources.description: A COMPLETE DVD. Features custom menu either poster art or still shot from one of the movies overlaid with an audio track. Burning process is beyond easy: Download zipped folder, open it, extract the VIDEO_TS folder and burn to disc, that's the easiest way. I've also uploaded the files outside the .zip so they can be viewed here on this site. This disc features MANOS THE HANDS OF FATE & BLOODY PIT OF HORROR as well the preview and intermission reels. Enjoy the show! Made from stuff that's already here.
